snippet.title: Isometric Squares - Pre-order now!
snippet.description:
Game will go live on iOS on July 9th and a little bit later on Android. 

Isometric Squares is a minimalistic logic puzzle game that blends 2D & 3D worlds. Switch your perspective and sharpen your mind in order to solve all the puzzles. It's a great training for your spatial vision! 

Goal is simple: combine square from squares. 
Challenge yourself and try to fit all the squares into the grid. 
Just move them into the correct places. It's not that easy as it seems!

Game offers two modes: 
- difficult with isometric 3D view
- easy with top down 2D view 
Choose one which suits you more!
